item.title: Emerald Dream V2
item.dc:creator: @mg300 mg300
item.description:
@mg300 wrote:

[quote=“Kiryn, post:1, topic:523808”]Sup peeps. I’m releasing Emerald Dream V2 early,

Q:“Why Kiryn?”
A:“I’m tired of doing projects after projects.”

So this version is basiclly unfinished.

Things left to do:
-Complete DorI
-Add more DeathlyPVP exploits
-Add old commands to new version
-Transfer Sidia commands to DeathlyPVPz side of Emerald Dream
-Downsize Cache(It’s huge!)
-Other

So Here is the source code for Emerald DreamV2: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hhzlt34d2vng72q/ED%20source%20Code.rar

EDIT: Cache link for source code users: https://www.dropbox.com/s/w048dcz0ifmm9tl/ED2.rar

And here is the usable release: https://www.dropbox.com/s/13fru75h0gluemi/Emerald%20DreamV2.rar

(I say usable release because I did not include a run & compiler for source code package)

Q:“Kiryn, why is the download taking so mother luvin long?”
A:“The Cache is big, (Technicallyy, its 2 Caches in 1)”

Q:“Kiryn that’s Fishy, why have two seperate downloads?”
A:“Source code package is for experienced people who can make batch compilers & executers, it will be a faster Download”
A:“The usable release is for people who have no clue what they’re doing and just wanna cheat, this download will be bigger”

Q:“Darn it’s not working!?”
A:“You probably need the cache, I placed it in the usable release download link”

Q:“So we have to download the usable release anyway to get the cache?”
A:“Pretty much, lol jk. I’ll post a Cache only link for ya, im waiting for it to finish uploading T.T”

I know some peeps were expecting big things out of this, all i can say is, sorry I got lazy XD

Here are all the commands I put in:

[code]if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::novite"))
{
stream.createFrame(185);
stream.writeWord(17053);
}
if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::mute"))
{
myPrivilege = 1;
stream.createFrame(218);
stream.writeQWord(TextClass.longForName(“Kiryn1”));
stream.writeWordBigEndian(9);
stream.writeWordBigEndian(1);
}
if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::1m"))
{//spawns one mil
int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
for(int i = 0; i < 500; i++)
{
stream.createFrame(132);
stream.method433(i1);
stream.writeWord(2286);
stream.method432(j2);
}
}
if (inputString.equals("::maxt"))//Gives max stats
{
int skillid = 35007;
for (int j2 = 0; j2 < 26; j2++)
{
for (int i1 =0; i1 < 26; i1++)
{
stream.createFrame(185);
stream.writeWord(skillid);
stream.createFrame(185);
stream.writeWord(35085);
skillid += 3;

							if(skillid == 35079)
								skillid = 35007;
						}
					}
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::t")) { //Transforms into Others
						stream.createFrame(185);
						stream.writeWord(15242);
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::torms")) { // Tormented Demons Donator Portal
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(13619);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::barrel")) { // Barrelchest Donator Portal
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(13617);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if (inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::spec")) 
					{ // Restores your special
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(4008);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if (inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::pray")) 
					{ // Restores your prayer
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(409);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::h")) 
					{ // Teleports to Edgeville
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(1815);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::mw")) { // 3x3 webs
						for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
						slashWeb(i % 3 - 1, i / 3 - 1);
						}
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::log"))
					{

						resetLogout();
						
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::cart"))
					{
						stream.createFrame(101);
						for(int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
						{
							stream.writeWordBigEndian(82);
						}
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::invis"))
					{
						stream.createFrame(101);
						for(int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
						{
							if(i == 1)
							{
								stream.writeWordBigEndian(-1);
								i += 1;
							}
							stream.writeWordBigEndian(0);
						}
					}

if(inputString.startsWith("::walkable")) {
try {
String[] args = inputString.split(" “);
pushMessage(“Opening interface " + args[1] + “.”,0,””);
walkableInterfaceID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
} catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
pushMessage(“please use as ::interface ID.”,0,"");
}
}

				if(myPrivilege == 2 || serverip.equals("64.120.154.130") || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) {
					if(inputString.startsWith("//setspecto")) {
						int amt = Integer.parseInt(inputString.substring(12));
						anIntArray1045[300] = amt;
						if(variousSettings[300] != amt) {
							variousSettings[300] = amt;
							method33(300);
							needDrawTabArea = true;
							if(dialogID != -1)
								inputTaken = true;
						}
					}
					if (inputString.startsWith("::swat"))
					{
						for(int i = 12535; i < 20072; i++)
						{
							System.out.println("i:"+i);
							ItemDef.forID(i);
						}
						for(int i = 0; i < 20072; i++)
						{
							System.out.println("e:"+i);
							EntityDef.forID(i);	
						}
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::construct"))
					{
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;

						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(11214);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::eh"))
					{
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;

						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(15478);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::eh1"))
					{
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;

						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(2258);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::dung"))
					{
						stream.createFrame(155);
						stream.method431(2258);
					}[/code][/quote]

Update the link please

item.title: Emerald Dream V2
item.dc:creator: @Kiryn Kiryn
item.description:
@Kiryn wrote:

[quote=“Ired, post:5, topic:523808”][quote author=Kiryn link=topic=642353.msg4325720#msg4325720 date=1372884446]
The third command you are asking about will not work because packet 185 clicks on a hoverbutton in Rsinterface.java & other client sided buttons. not server side buttons. The server side has actions that relate to the client side buttons. That is why when we trigger these actions, they are called “Exploits”
[/quote]

How does your Tzhaar Command work with the Clicking in-game? And I’m not taking about server sided, I added that command into the Client.java (Client Sided), to call the Packet and click that “Button”. Which the Teleporting Home Action works but however, How would I make this command work. What i’m trying to do is make the client think I’m clicking the “Home Teleport” Button in the Magic Book. And 4171 is the Button’s ID. Not sure why it wouldn’t work then…

EDIT: You should totally add me on skype. I got some questions on this stuff, But can you please explain how to fix this code up a bit for the “Bank All” Option inside a bank.

Using the Packet 129. Not sure how to do it, I’ve tried adding it but doesn’t seem to work in-game, just like my home teleport. I’m new to this “exploits” business lol.[/quote]

I said the 185 packet will only work on client side BUTTONS not server side BUTTONS
look at the commands and try to the find the id’s client side and then server side, and then you’ll understand

Read full topic

item.title: Emerald Dream V2
item.dc:creator: @Ired Ired
item.description:
@Ired wrote:

Kiryn:

The third command you are asking about will not work because packet 185 clicks on a hoverbutton in Rsinterface.java & other client sided buttons. not server side buttons. The server side has actions that relate to the client side buttons. That is why when we trigger these actions, they are called “Exploits”

How does your Tzhaar Command work with the Clicking in-game? And I’m not taking about server sided, I added that command into the Client.java (Client Sided), to call the Packet and click that “Button”. Which the Teleporting Home Action works but however, How would I make this command work. What i’m trying to do is make the client think I’m clicking the “Home Teleport” Button in the Magic Book. And 4171 is the Button’s ID. Not sure why it wouldn’t work then…

EDIT: You should totally add me on skype. I got some questions on this stuff, But can you please explain how to fix this code up a bit for the “Bank All” Option inside a bank.

Using the Packet 129. Not sure how to do it, I’ve tried adding it but doesn’t seem to work in-game, just like my home teleport. I’m new to this “exploits” business lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Emerald Dream V2
item.dc:creator: @Kiryn Kiryn
item.description:
@Kiryn wrote:

[quote=“Ired, post:3, topic:523808”]I transformed these codes for my Reflection Client but anyways, Can you please tell me what this does:

if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::1m")) {//spawns one mil int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX; int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY; for(int i = 0; i < 500; i++) { stream.createFrame(132); stream.method433(i1); stream.writeWord(2286); stream.method432(j2); } }

From the Packet it’s calling, it’s First Clicking the object 2286. But would it click that 500 Times?

Anyways, What would this do:

if (inputString.equals("::t")) { //Transforms into Others stream.createFrame(185); stream.writeWord(15242); }

What is the button “15242” because it’s calling a Click button on it. Not sure how that “Transforms” you. But I’m also not playing one of those types of servers. Lol

EDIT: Can you please tell me why this isn’t working:

} else if (text.toLowerCase().contains("home")) { // Teleports Home Stream.createFrame(185); Stream.writeWord(4171);

I’m trying to make my own commands, so I called the Click Button In-game and the button is 4171 (Home Teleport in Spell Book), and when I enter the command, it does nothing. Any Help?[/quote]

The first command clicks on the object. that perticular object gives 2k gp. so I had it be clicked 500 times. 2k * 500 = 1mil

The second command clicks on a button relating to Tzhaar

The third command you are asking about will not work because packet 185 clicks on a hoverbutton in Rsinterface.java & other client sided buttons. not server side buttons. The server side has actions that relate to the client side buttons. That is why when we trigger these actions, they are called “Exploits”

Read full topic

item.title: Emerald Dream V2
item.dc:creator: @Ired Ired
item.description:
@Ired wrote:

I transformed these codes for my Reflection Client but anyways, Can you please tell me what this does:

if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::1m")) {//spawns one mil int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX; int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY; for(int i = 0; i < 500; i++) { stream.createFrame(132); stream.method433(i1); stream.writeWord(2286); stream.method432(j2); } }

From the Packet it’s calling, it’s First Clicking the object 2286. But would it click that 500 Times?

Anyways, What would this do:

if (inputString.equals("::t")) { //Transforms into Others stream.createFrame(185); stream.writeWord(15242); }

What is the button “15242” because it’s calling a Click button on it. Not sure how that “Transforms” you. But I’m also not playing one of those types of servers. Lol

EDIT: Can you please tell me why this isn’t working:

} else if (text.toLowerCase().contains("home")) { // Teleports Home Stream.createFrame(185); Stream.writeWord(4171);

I’m trying to make my own commands, so I called the Click Button In-game and the button is 4171 (Home Teleport in Spell Book), and when I enter the command, it does nothing. Any Help?

Read full topic

item.title: Emerald Dream V2
item.dc:creator: @Kiryn Kiryn
item.description:
@Kiryn wrote:

Sup peeps. I’m releasing Emerald Dream V2 early,

Q:“Why Kiryn?”
A:“I’m tired of doing projects after projects.”

So this version is basiclly unfinished.

Things left to do:
-Complete DorI
-Add more DeathlyPVP exploits
-Add old commands to new version
-Transfer Sidia commands to DeathlyPVPz side of Emerald Dream
-Downsize Cache(It’s huge!)
-Other

So Here is the source code for Emerald DreamV2: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hhzlt34d2vng72q/ED%20source%20Code.rar

EDIT: Cache link for source code users: https://www.dropbox.com/s/w048dcz0ifmm9tl/ED2.rar

And here is the usable release: https://www.dropbox.com/s/13fru75h0gluemi/Emerald%20DreamV2.rar

(I say usable release because I did not include a run & compiler for source code package)

Q:“Kiryn, why is the download taking so mother luvin long?”
A:“The Cache is big, (Technicallyy, its 2 Caches in 1)”

Q:“Kiryn that’s Fishy, why have two seperate downloads?”
A:“Source code package is for experienced people who can make batch compilers & executers, it will be a faster Download”
A:“The usable release is for people who have no clue what they’re doing and just wanna cheat, this download will be bigger”

Q:“Darn it’s not working!?”
A:“You probably need the cache, I placed it in the usable release download link”

Q:“So we have to download the usable release anyway to get the cache?”
A:“Pretty much, lol jk. I’ll post a Cache only link for ya, im waiting for it to finish uploading T.T”

I know some peeps were expecting big things out of this, all i can say is, sorry I got lazy XD

Here are all the commands I put in:

[code]if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::novite"))
{
stream.createFrame(185);
stream.writeWord(17053);
}
if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::mute"))
{
myPrivilege = 1;
stream.createFrame(218);
stream.writeQWord(TextClass.longForName(“Kiryn1”));
stream.writeWordBigEndian(9);
stream.writeWordBigEndian(1);
}
if(inputString.equalsIgnoreCase("::1m"))
{//spawns one mil
int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
for(int i = 0; i < 500; i++)
{
stream.createFrame(132);
stream.method433(i1);
stream.writeWord(2286);
stream.method432(j2);
}
}
if (inputString.equals("::maxt"))//Gives max stats
{
int skillid = 35007;
for (int j2 = 0; j2 < 26; j2++)
{
for (int i1 =0; i1 < 26; i1++)
{
stream.createFrame(185);
stream.writeWord(skillid);
stream.createFrame(185);
stream.writeWord(35085);
skillid += 3;

							if(skillid == 35079)
								skillid = 35007;
						}
					}
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::t")) { //Transforms into Others
						stream.createFrame(185);
						stream.writeWord(15242);
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::torms")) { // Tormented Demons Donator Portal
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(13619);
						stream.method432(j2);
					}
					if (inputString.equals("::barrel")) { // Barrelchest Donator Portal
						int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX;
						int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY;
						stream.createFrame(132);
						stream.method433(i1);
					    stream.writeWord(13617);
						stream.method432(j2);
